name: Survivalcraft World File
summary: Learn about .SCWORLD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SCWORLD files can be played by the Survivalcraft game and edited by the Survivalcraft File Explorer.

description: World file format used by Survivalcraft, a survival game that features gameplay and graphics similar to Minecraft; stores all the data that makes up a playable world, such as location of caves and available resources.
